title: [突發]意大利女手足Patrizia De Grazia發起12日絕食行動 聲援12港人

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/BeWaterHongKong/videos/3453652331380964

BeWater HK 11h
https://www.facebook.com/2406628919558580/posts/2812486615639473/

#GlobalSupport #RadicaliItaliani
Italian Activists Launch Global Action to #Save12HKYouths
Patrizia De Grazia of Radicali Italiani (Italian Radicals) has initiated a 12-day protest since October 12, 2020, demanding Chinese authorities to return 12 pro-democracy Hongkongers, who have been detained in China for over 50 days.
De Grazia is sending a video message to people around the world. While she is undergoing a hunger strike for at least 12 days, she hopes the international community could also speak up for Hong Kong.
In the coming days, De Grazia and the members of Radicali Italiani are travelling to different parts of Italy to raise concern over the humanitarian crisis in Hong Kong.
The marathon campaign includes protesting outside the Chinese embassy and consulate, singing the protest anthem "Glory to Hong Kong" in Cantonese and Italian, speaking at the parliament and spreading news about Hong Kong situation to the international community.
For more information:
https://www.radicali.it/20201012/stand-hong-kong-12-giorni-di-iniziative-per-hong-kong/
#FirstHand #Video #13Oct2020
#12LivesMatter #PatriziaDeGrazia
